turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there! How can I help?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh yes, I'd like to order a coffee drink for pick up at a Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing! What can I get you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like an iced cinnamon shortbread latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay, what size did you want?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Tall, got it! did you want whip cream?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is regular milk fine with you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay, and at which location would you like to pick it up at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: a beach in Western in Fort Worth, Texas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay, one second, let me find that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would it be the location on 6405 N Beach St?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So i got a Tall Iced Cinnamon Dolce Latte with coconut with whip cream,

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, one moment while i send that over to starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, your order has been sent to your desired location. It will be ready for pickup in 5-8 min.
